Type of Model Parameters

parameters_type.Rd

Type of Model Parameters

parameters_type(model, ...)

Arguments

model

A statistical model.
...

Arguments passed to or from other methods.

Value

A data.frame.

Examples

library(parameters)
model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species * Sepal.Width * Petal.Length, data = iris)

parameters_type(model)
#>                                     Parameter        Type         Term
#> 1                                 (Intercept)   intercept         <NA>
#> 2                           Speciesversicolor      factor      Species
#> 3                            Speciesvirginica      factor      Species
#> 4                                 Sepal.Width     numeric  Sepal.Width
#> 5                                Petal.Length     numeric Petal.Length
#> 6               Speciesversicolor:Sepal.Width interaction  Sepal.Width
#> 7                Speciesvirginica:Sepal.Width interaction  Sepal.Width
#> 8              Speciesversicolor:Petal.Length interaction Petal.Length
#> 9               Speciesvirginica:Petal.Length interaction Petal.Length
#> 10                   Sepal.Width:Petal.Length interaction Petal.Length
#> 11 Speciesversicolor:Sepal.Width:Petal.Length interaction Petal.Length
#> 12  Speciesvirginica:Sepal.Width:Petal.Length interaction Petal.Length
#>                       Parameter2
#> 1                           <NA>
#> 2                           <NA>
#> 3                           <NA>
#> 4                           <NA>
#> 5                           <NA>
#> 6              Speciesversicolor
#> 7               Speciesvirginica
#> 8              Speciesversicolor
#> 9               Speciesvirginica
#> 10                   Sepal.Width
#> 11 Speciesversicolor:Sepal.Width
#> 12  Speciesvirginica:Sepal.Width
